title: Much Ado About Twitter: On Twitter Persona's with James Lindsay
description:
I have had a number of questions regarding my friend James Lindsay's twitter persona for a while now, and he was kind enough to sit down with me to address these. This was a very honest conversation, we agreed in some areas while disagreeing in others. All in all Jim was very open with his answers and I look forward to presenting part 2 next week

Listen to the podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Much-Ado-About-Twitter-On-Twitter-Personas-with-James-Lindsay-ejv72e

Find Jim's new book "Cynical Theories" here: 
https://www.amazon.com/Cynical-Theories-Scholarship-Everything-Identity-ebook/dp/B08BGCM5QZ

Follow Jim on Twitter here: @ConceptualJames 

Follow me on Twitter here: @AndreaLynnLewis
email me at: andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
